org.aludratest.config

Interface AludraTestConfig

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AludraTestConfigImpl

    public interface AludraTestConfig
extends Configurable
    Provides the central configuration of AludraTest.
    If you need access to an instance of this interface, the preferred way is to ask your context object for a newComponentInstance() using this Interface class as the key.
    Author:
    Volker Bergmann, falbrech

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        String getVersion()
        Returns:
        The version of AludraTest, e.g. 2.7.0-17.

      • isStopTestCaseOnInteractionException

        boolean isStopTestCaseOnInteractionException()
        Returns:
        whether to stop test step execution on exceptions in a Interaction

      • isStopTestCaseOnVerificationException

        boolean isStopTestCaseOnVerificationException()
        Returns:
        whether to stop test step execution on exceptions in a Verification

      • isLoggingDisabled

        boolean isLoggingDisabled()
        Returns:
        whether to stop test logging

      • isStopTestCaseOnOtherException

        boolean isStopTestCaseOnOtherException()
        Returns:
        whether to stop test step execution on exceptions in a location other than Interaction or Verification

      • getXlsRootPath

        String getXlsRootPath()
        Returns:
        the root path to check for Excel files which are consumed to fill test case parameters.

      • getNumberOfThreads

        int getNumberOfThreads()
        Returns:
        the number of Threads to use by the AludraTest test runner. Default value is 1.

      • isConfigTabRequired

        boolean isConfigTabRequired()
        Returns:
        if each Excel sheet must have a 'config' tab

      • isIgnoreEnabled

        boolean isIgnoreEnabled()
        Returns:
        Indicates if test case classes can be marked as ignored. If false, the Ignored annotation will itself be ignored, causing the marked tests to be executed.

      • getNumericTolerance

        double getNumericTolerance()
        Returns the numeric tolerance to use for double precision based operations.
        Returns:
        The numeric tolerance to use for double precision based operations.

      • isDebugAttachmentsOnFrameworkException

        boolean isDebugAttachmentsOnFrameworkException()
        Returns if debug attachments shall be created when a Framework Exception occurs.
        Returns:
        true if to include debug attachments on Framework Exceptions.

      • getRunnerTreeSorterName

        String getRunnerTreeSorterName()
        Returns the simple or fully qualified name of a Runner Tree Sorter to use. Simple names should be looked up in package org.aludratest.scheduler.sort.
        Returns:
        The simple or fully qualified name of a Runner Tree Sorter to use.

      • isAttachmentsFileBuffer

        boolean isAttachmentsFileBuffer()
        Returns true if test step attachments shall be buffered on the file system as temporary files, to reduce memory usage when running many test cases.
        Returns:
        true to buffer test step attachments on file system, false otherwise.

      • getScriptSecondsOffset

        int getScriptSecondsOffset()
        Returns the amount of seconds to add to test data script results (when they evaluate to a Date value). This can be used for "time travel" features of the application under test.
        Returns:
        The amount of seconds to add to test data script results. Can be zero or negative.

      • isDeferredScriptEvaluation

        boolean isDeferredScriptEvaluation()
        Returns true if script expressions in XML data shall be evaluated only when the according test case execution starts. Otherwise, they are evaluated when the test execution tree is built (default).
        Returns:
        true if script expressions in XML data shall be evaluated only when the according test case execution starts, false otherwise.
